ValidationRule.description: Sales2Service is created by clicking the Sales Case button. This validation rule will restrict who can create it.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Sales2Service Case", ISNEW(), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), OR( CONTAINS(LOWER($User.Title),'oasis'), CONTAINS(LOWER($User.Title),'hroi'), ISPICKVAL( $User.License_Type__c , 'PEO HROi'), CONTAINS(LOWER($Profile.Name),'oasis'), CONTAINS(LOWER($Profile.Name),'hroi')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to create a Sales2Service case.
